title: Temporal Data Leakage Detection Toolkit for CI/CD Build Prediction
description: Complete replication package for PLOS ONE paper: A taxonomy for detecting and preventing temporal data leakage in machine learning-based build prediction. Includes 3-type leakage taxonomy, dual-platform datasets (TravisTorrent + GHALogs), and ML training pipelines.
